amendment.description: Page 275, line 19, after the dollar amount, insert ``(reduced by $200,000,000)''. Page 274, line 16, after the dollar amount, insert ``(increased by $2,816,446,000)''.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 415 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Environmental Protection Agency account by $200,000,00 and increase the Environmental Protection Agency, State and Tribal Assistance Grant by $2,816,446,000.

action.text: Mr. Simpson raised a point of order against the Edwards amendment (A039). Mr. Simpson stated that the amendment seeks to amend portionof the bill not yet read for consideration. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Ms. Edwards.
